unnormalised: Choosing a payment gateway is more stressful than deciding which biryani to order on Zomato during Onam! So many options, it's like choosing between IIT Bombay and IIT Delhi. I'm just hoping my customers don't get confused and think they're donating to some random Baba ka Dhaba instead of buying my handmade diyas. Seriously, this is harder than haggling with a vendor in Chandni Chowk!
